meanings.definition: A portable electronic device for recording video and audio.
meanings.sent1: My dad bought a new camcorder to film our family vacation.
meanings.sent2: The camcorder captured every moment of the birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The camcorder decided to take a break after filming non-stop for hours.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a camcorder, recording every detail of the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The camcorder hummed happily as it recorded the children playing in the park.

meanings.definition: To record video and audio using a camcorder.
meanings.sent1: I will camcorder the school play for everyone who couldn't attend.
meanings.sent2: She camcorders all our family gatherings to create lasting memories.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to camcorder the birds chirping outside the window.
meanings.sent4: His memory camcordered the scene in his mind for future reference.
meanings.sent5: The journalist camcordered the interview to ensure accuracy in the article.
